revised_title: The Chromaffine System in Annelids and its Relation to the Contractile Vascular System
tldr: The author investigates the chromaffine system in annelids and its relationship to the contractile vascular system, finding that the presence of a chromaffine system is common in annelids and other members of the vertebrate kingdom. The study also explores the connection between the chromaffine system, the contractile vascular system, and the sympathetic nervous system.
